title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 28-1.7 - Reapplication
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 28-1.7 - Reapplication

State Regulations

Whether or not the applicant appeals from the determination
of the panel, the applicant may reapply for licensure to the director of the

Division of Professional Licensing Services after the expiration of 18 months
from the date of service of the report of the panel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
28-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
